Step.Name: create stored procedures
Step.Script: CREATE PROCEDURE "${DbName}"."${Company}_SP_TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION" ( IN object_type nvarchar(30), --对象类型（BOCode） IN transaction_type nvarchar(1), --业务类型（Add:A-添加, Update:U-更新, Delete:D-删除） IN num_of_cols_in_key integer, --主键个数 IN list_of_key_cols_tab_del nvarchar(255), --主键名称 IN list_of_cols_val_tab_del nvarchar(255), --主键值 IN user integer --用户标识 ) LANGUAGE SQLSCRIPT AS BEGIN DECLARE error_code integer; --返回值(0 无错误) DECLARE error_message nvarchar(200); --返回的消息 SELECT 0 INTO error_code FROM dummy; SELECT 'OK' INTO error_message FROM dummy; -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --ADD YOUR CODE HERE -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --返回结果 SELECT TO_INTEGER(error_code) "Code", error_message "Message" FROM dummy; END;
